Posts.Content: Good morning Dreamthief, I'd just like to say it's people like you who take the time to answer and give much needed info to those who r in need that others ,like me, not good with words and no knowledge do a wonderful thing.  I don't know what it is but it's a strange warm feeling inside, then seems to go to my brain when seeing someone helped. It's up there with people who have fab news re their C. or the birth of a baby etc. Once again thank u and anyone else who helps.  D
Posts.Title: Can I Just Have A Bit Of A Moan

Posts.Content: Hi Irish girl, my pains would start a few days after chemo and last about a week.  No medication eased them,only caused caused constipation. I'm sure it is nerve pain as it seemed to be connected with the pins and needles. Sorry can't be more helpful but when chemo ended so did the pain.
Posts.Title: Docetaxol psins
